resources.string: SELECT SUM(count_p) AS count, SUM(wins_p) as wins, player FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_p, SUM(match_winner = 1) AS wins_p, match_player2 as player FROM matches WHERE match_winner != 0 AND match_player1 = ? GROUP BY match_player2 UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_p, SUM(match_winner = 2) AS wins_p, match_player1 as player FROM matches WHERE match_winner != 0 AND match_player2 = ? GROUP BY match_player1 ) GROUP BY player

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT match_id as _id, match_player1, match_player2, match_winner * 2 as match_winner FROM matches UNION ALL VALUES (-2, NULL, NULL, -1), (-1, NULL, NULL, 1) ) ORDER BY match_winner ASC
